import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./Contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [showSuccessModal, setShowSuccessModal] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; // ‚úÖ EMAILJS SUBMIT const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); const templateParams = { name: form.name, email: form.email, subject: form.subject, message: form.message }; emailjs .send( "service_x2sy4ov", "template_2mtyx2p", templateParams, "1_0YGRViezqRkyJFD" ) .then(() => { setShowSuccessModal(true); setForm({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); setLoading(false); // Auto close modal after 4 seconds setTimeout(() => { setShowSuccessModal(false); }, 4000); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); alert("‚ùå Failed to send message. Please try again."); setLoading(false); }); }; return (
{/* Success Modal */} {showSuccessModal && (
setShowSuccessModal(false)} >
e.stopPropagation()}>
